message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth more than just monetary compensation. However, considering my costs and the market value, I propose a fair transaction of $12,000 for the product. This price reflects a balance between the product's worth to you and the expenses involved in acquiring and preparing it for delivery. I am confident this offer will be mutually beneficial. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
